Reviews.Content: Relaxing This Hotel is so relaxing that your stay in Bali will be unforgetttable.The staf is very friendly and pure.So is the food.Simple but good.Not haute cuisine.But the staf is willing to prepare a special dish for you just fot little costs.Also a cultural evening is possible.Just talk to the owner and he will arrrange such a evening.The rooms are clesn evenso is the pool , wich is situated in a loveley garden.Walking distance to the beach or centre of Kuta.The adress : Jl.Kartika Plaza Puspa Ayu Lane Tuban - Bali.
Reviews.Author: loe.gazpacho
